Product Description

Product Description
OmniForm Premium 5.0 is a complete solution that enables organizations to automate forms filling and data management. It is specifically designed to assist everyone in your organization that needs to design, distribute and fill out forms, and manage form data. 

Main Features
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Software Name: OmniForm v.5.0 Premium - Complete Product
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Features & Benefits: 
- Convert Paper Forms to Digital Quickly and Accurately 
- OmniForm instantly converts paper contracts, applications, administration, and surveys into digital, fill able forms on your P or on the Web. 

- Create Forms from Scratch: 
- Create your own forms with the help of the Designer Toolkit or use the pre-designed templates included. Save your work for future use. Save parts of your form and reuse them with a simple drag and drop. 

- Automatic Data Collection: 
- Automatic database support saves copies of the forms you fill, as well as the export profiles you define to ODBC-compliant databases like Access and Excel, saving you time and ensuring accuracy. 

- Handprint filling of forms: 
- Handwrite directly into form fields on the Tablet PC and have your handprint converted instantly to text. Makes remote data collection fast, easy and efficient. 

- Fill able PDF Forms and Formats: 
- Save PDF Forms with calculations, field validations, and signature fields - OmniForm creates the JavaScript automatically. Or save forms in HTML, RTF (Word), OmniForm, or Mail able Filler formats. 

- Built-In Form Filling Accuracy: 
- OmniForm adds form intelligence, field validations, and calculations to ensure your forms are filled correctly, every time. 

- Navigate forms using voice: 
- Use voice commands
